blogPost.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
blogPost.body: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
blogPost.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態
